name: master-thesis
description: master thesis - module libraries and examples for implementing distributed transactions with multiple web services

scripts.start-nontransactional: cd test-system/WrapperApi && npm run start-services && cd ../../ &
scripts.stop-nontransactional: cd test-system/WrapperApi && npm run stop-services && cd ../../
scripts.start-transactional: cd test-system-transactional/WrapperApi && npm run start-services && cd ../../ &
scripts.stop-transactional: cd test-system-transactional/WrapperApi && npm run stop-services && cd ../../
scripts.start-systems: npm run start-nontransactional && npm run start-transactional
scripts.posttest: npm run stop-nontransactional && npm run stop-transactional
scripts.post-install: npm run install-nonTransactional && npm run install-transactional && npm run install-modules
scripts.install-modules: npm run install-module-api-monkey && npm run install-module-compensation-js && npm run install-module-compensation-request && npm run install-module-transaction-lock-redis && npm run install-module-transaction-state-checker && npm run install-module-transaction-state-store-redis && npm run install-module-transaction-utility-amqp
scripts.install-transactional: npm run install-wrapperApi-transactional && npm run install-jobApi-transactional && npm run install-eventApi-transactional
scripts.install-nonTransactional: npm run install-wrapperApi && npm run install-jobApi && npm run install-eventApi

author: Matthias Fre√üdorf <mfressdorf@gmail.com> (http://mfressdorf.de)
